dcterms:description: TaxiNYC contains 267,953,551 taxi trip records in New York from 1st January 2014 to 30th June 2015. The city is split into 20 regions, each about 1km x 1km, with a time interval set to 1 hour. The records from 01/01/2014 to 04/30/2015 are used as training data, while the records in May 2015 and June 2015 are used as validation and test sets, respectively.
dcterms:title: TaxiNYC

dcterms:description: TaxiCD contains 7,065,937 taxicab records in Chengdu, China during November 2016. The city is split into 20 regions, each 2km x 2km, with a time interval set to 15 minutes. The data from 11/01/2016 to 11/25/2016 is used for training, while data in the following 2 days is set as validation and the last 3 days as test data.
dcterms:title: TaxiCD
